official_title: To require the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to treat all deposits at the Freedom National Bank of New York at the time such bank closed as insured deposits.

summary.text: Minority Bank Preservation Act - Requires the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to treat as insured deposits all deposits at the Freedom National Bank of New York on the date it was closed.

titles.title: To require the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to treat all deposits at the Freedom National Bank of New York at the time such bank closed as insured deposits.
